text: Armando Silvestre Carrascosa (January 28, 1926 - June 3, 2024) was a Mexican- American actor. He appeared in more than 190 movies from 1948 until 2016. He was born in San Diego, California. His best known roles were as Natchez in Geronimo (1962), Two Crows in The Scalphunters (1968), multiple roles in the television series Daniel Boone and The F.B.I.. Silvestre died on June 3, 2024 in California at the age of 98.Falleci√≥ Armando Silvestre; actor mexicano que trabajo en Hollywood con figuras relevantes como Clint Eastwood ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1926 births Category:2024 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Actors from San Diego Category:People from Baja California (state)
title: Armando Silvestre
